name: function-csv-upload
description: A typescript function which is a template for building cloud functions on GCP quickly.

scripts.start: node -e "console.error('Right now one cannot test this cloud function locally. Sorry :/'); process.exit(1);"
scripts.deploy:sandbox:
source .env && yarn run build && gcloud config set project awell-sandbox && gcloud functions deploy $CLOUD_FUNCTION_NAME --gen2 --trigger-bucket=$STORAGE_BUCKET_NAME --trigger-location=us --runtime=nodejs20 --region us-central1 --entry-point=$CLOUD_EVENT_NAME --source=. --set-env-vars=$(grep -v '^GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=' ./.env | tr '
' ',')
scripts.deploy:eu:
source .env && yarn run build && gcloud config set project awell-production && gcloud functions deploy $CLOUD_FUNCTION_NAME --gen2 --trigger-bucket=$STORAGE_BUCKET_NAME --trigger-location=us --runtime=nodejs20 --region us-central1 --entry-point=$CLOUD_EVENT_NAME --source=. --set-env-vars=$(grep -v '^GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS' ./.env | tr '
' ',')
scripts.deploy:us:
source .env && yarn run build && gcloud config set project awell-production-us && gcloud functions deploy $CLOUD_FUNCTION_NAME --gen2 --trigger-bucket=$STORAGE_BUCKET_NAME --trigger-location=us --runtime=nodejs20 --region us-central1 --entry-point=$CLOUD_EVENT_NAME --source=. --set-env-vars=$(grep -v '^GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS' ./.env  | tr '
' ',')
scripts.deploy:local:
source .env && yarn run build && gcloud alpha functions local deploy csv-upload --entry-point=$CLOUD_EVENT_NAME --runtime=nodejs20 --source=. --set-env-vars=$(grep -v '^GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS' ./.env  | tr '
' ',')
scripts.trigger:local: source .env && gcloud alpha functions local call csv-upload --data='{"bucket": "$STORAGE_BUCKET_NAME", "name": "test-file.csv"}'

author: Awell
